detail_desc: Short, round-neck dress in crinkled, patterned jersey with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, short, frill-trimmed sleeves and a yoke with a frill trim at the front.
Ankle-length chinos in sturdy cotton twill with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Front pockets, welt back pockets and straight legs with creases.
Ankle-length chinos in sturdy cotton twill with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Front pockets, welt back pockets and straight legs with creases.
Jacket in soft, felted fabric with decorative stitching, a high collar and concealed press-studs at the front. Detachable tie belt at the waist and front pockets. Lined.
Jacket in soft, felted fabric with decorative stitching, a high collar and concealed press-studs at the front. Detachable tie belt at the waist and front pockets. Lined.
Shorts in grained imitation leather. High waist with elastication at the back and a detachable belt with metal D-rings. Concealed zip fly and diagonal side pockets. Unlined.
Long-sleeved dress in sturdy, textured jersey made from an organic cotton blend with a round neck, seam and flared skirt. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Unlined.
Long-sleeved dress in sturdy, textured jersey made from an organic cotton blend with a round neck, seam and flared skirt. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Unlined.
Long-sleeved dress in sturdy, textured jersey made from an organic cotton blend with a round neck, seam and flared skirt. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Unlined.
Short dress in jersey crêpe with a concealed zip at the back. 3/4-length sleeves with flounced trims, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a flounced hem. Unlined.
Leggings with soft elastication at the waist and extra room for a growing tummy.
Leggings with soft elastication at the waist and extra room for a growing tummy.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim and an adjustable tab with a plastic fastener at the back. Zip with a wind flap and concealed press-studs down the front. Flap chest pockets and front pockets with a hook and loop fastening, Diagonal pockets on top of the front pockets with partial fleece lining. Inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Short dress in a crisp cotton weave with flounced trims at the top. Wrapover front with narrow ties at the waist and long puff sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Lined skirt.

Long dress in an airy weave with a wrapover front, hook-and-eye fastener at the neckline and a concealed zip in one side. Gathers at the shoulders and long balloon sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Seam with a wide, pleated panel at the waist, and a flared, pleated skirt. Lined.

Long dress in an airy weave with a wrapover front, hook-and-eye fastener at the neckline and a concealed zip in one side. Gathers at the shoulders and long balloon sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Seam with a wide, pleated panel at the waist, and a flared, pleated skirt. Lined.

Long dress in an airy weave with a wrapover front, hook-and-eye fastener at the neckline and a concealed zip in one side. Gathers at the shoulders and long balloon sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Seam with a wide, pleated panel at the waist, and a flared, pleated skirt. Lined.
Biker jacket in imitation suede with a faux fur lining and details. Notch lapels, a diagonal zip down the front and side pockets.
Slip-on trainers in cotton canvas with reversible sequins on the top, a lightly padded top edge, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Blouse in satin with a sheen. Deep V-neck, covered buttons down the front, and long sleeves with pleats on the shoulders and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Pleated waist with a wide lace trim.
Ankle-length trousers in soft jersey with straight, wide legs. Wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Ankle-length trousers in soft jersey with straight, wide legs. Wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Short skirt in a sturdy weave with decorative, sparkly stone buttons down the front and a concealed zip at the back. Seam and a lined, wrapover flounce at the hem.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a double-layered, drawstring hood, zip down the front, two-part kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a double-layered, drawstring hood, zip down the front, two-part kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with ribbed panels at the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slim Fit.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with ribbed panels at the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slim Fit.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with ribbed panels at the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slim Fit.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
V-neck tunic in a cool, softly draping viscose weave with a stand-up collar, buttons down the front and narrow ties under the bust. Gathered yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
V-neck tunic in a cool, softly draping viscose weave with a stand-up collar, buttons down the front and narrow ties under the bust. Gathered yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Joggers in slub cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, patch front pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Boots in imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft, padded top edge and zip in one side. Elasticated lacing at the front, a loop at the back and decorative welt seams around the soles. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky soles. Height of soles 2.3 cm.
Top in waffled jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neckline and long sleeves.

CONSCIOUS Joggers in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Knee-length dress in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a slightly wider neckline and an opening with ties at the back of the neck. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy, and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton and viscose blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a lace trim at the hem.

Jacket in soft fleece designed to be worn either as a jacket or as a thermal mid layer. Stand-up collar, concealed zip down the front and side pockets. Unlined. Regular Fit. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.

Blouse in airy, crinkled, patterned satin with a grandad collar and buttons down the front. Long raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Bolero in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend containing glittery threads with a button at the neck and long sleeves with roll edges.

Leggings in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a regular waist with covered elastication.
Sleeveless, A-line dress in woven fabric with reversible sequins on the front, a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. V-neck front and back with a lace trim, and long sleeves.

Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Oversized hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric. Rib-trimmed, jersey-lined hood with a drawstring at the front, low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Flared leggings in ribbed cotton jersey with a regular, elasticated waist.
Top in softly draping, ribbed jersey with a sheen. V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and a lace trim at the top.
